heading: Certification
text:
No certificate of occupancy shall be issued for any building or open lot requiring a certification
   pursuant to article 108 unless and until the applicant, after completion of construction work, inspects the side walk and certifies
   that the sidewalk is free from defects.
     Exception: The commissioner may issue a certificate of occupancy if in lieu of such certification the owner furnishes to the
     department prior to the issuance of the certificate of occupancy security satisfactory to the department that the sidewalk will be
     installed and paved or repaired within the time specified by the department.
